channel.title: Mobile on WebSnippet is a blog to share top quality open source resources for developers
channel.description: Recent content in Mobile on WebSnippet is a blog to share top quality open source resources for developers

item.title: The Top Hybrid Mobile Application Frameworks
item.author: mirodil@websnippet.io (Mirodil)
item.description: An HTML application is very attractive if you need to support many types of devices and platforms and you either don’t have the internal resources to develop and maintain native applications or you don’t have the budget to pay someone to do it for you. It’s also a tempting option to just reuse a responsive web application that may already exist and save yourself the headache of a new project.
